Plot: Rufus Wainwright and his sister Martha celebrate their late mother Kate McGarrigle, joined by friends EmmyLou Harris, Norah Jones and more. The film deals with love and loss and the ...
Title: Sing Me the Songs That Say I Love You: A Concert for Kate McGarrigle
Actors: Rufus Wainwright, Martha Wainwright, Anna McGarrigle, Jane McGarrigle
